PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaterialWoodBasedPanel
PropertySetDef.Definition: This is a collection of mechanical properties related to wood-based materials for panel-like products like plywood or OSB. The propositions given above for wood-based beam materials with respect to anisotropy, strength graduation according to element sizes (especially panel thickness) apply accordingly.

PropertyDef.Name: ApplicableStructuralDesignMethod
PropertyDef.Definition: Determines whether mechanical material properties are applicable to 'ASD' = allowable stress design (working stress design), 'LSD' = limit state design, or 'LRFD' = load and resistance factor design.

PropertyDef.Name: InPlane
PropertyDef.Definition: Mechanical properties with respect to in-plane load, i.e. for function as a membrane.

PropertyDef.Name: OutOfPlane
PropertyDef.Definition: Mechanical properties with respect to out-of-plane load, i.e. for function as a plate; tension zone of unbalanced layups is stressed in tension.

PropertyDef.Name: OutOfPlaneNegative
PropertyDef.Definition: Mechanical properties with respect to out-of-plane load i.e. for function as a plate; compression zone of unbalanced layups is stressed in tension.
